name: Nowhere To Go (User987)
description:
You awake on an island in the middle of nowhere, surrounded by evil creatures. How long can you survive for when you are heavily outnumbered? Fighting is the only way through because remember, there is nowhere to go!

Nowhere To Go is a 2D, top-down, wave-based shooter. The longer you survive, the harder it becomes.

Controls:

W - Move forward (in direction of mouse).

S - Move backwards (in opposite direction of mouse).

Mouse pointer - Points character towards mouse direction.

Left click - Shoot.
